column4: appears your Grub 21 may be BIOS related see - http://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/bug-grub/2003-02/msg00082.html & http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-general-1/grub-error-21-338856/ for more info
i will read that, altough it did work fine before when i had dual boot with windows :/
i think it's a BIOS setting rather then "problem"
well there are not many settings in my bios and i already changed them to factory default
